survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on user experience and satisfaction with public EV charging stations to identify areas for improvement and inform future infrastructure development.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge frequency of usage.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to understand key decision factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox, max 3 selections allowed

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify common pain points.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox, include an 'Other' option with text input

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional feedback or suggestions you have for improving public EV charging stations.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional feedback or suggestions you have for improving public EV charging stations.
